attributes.action: Stop the strict dress codes in UK schools
attributes.background: students should not be getting into trouble for there skirts being fitted or there pants being fitted, or if they have a little bit of jewellery on, if it doesn’t effect there learning then it shouldn’t matter. As long as they are getting there education that’s all that matters.

rejection.details:
School uniform polices are a matter for individual schools, not the Government or House of Commons.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Make school uniform optional for students in secondary schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/582011
